Parameter.Name: horizViewAngle
Parameter.DisplayName: Horizontal view angle of camera (in degrees)

Parameter.Name: vertViewAngle
Parameter.DisplayName: Vertical view angle of camera (in degrees)

Parameter.Name: objToLensHeight
Parameter.DisplayName: Height from object to camera lenses

Parameter.Name: lensToMotorProjection
Parameter.DisplayName: Distance between projections of lenses' axis and motors axis

Parameter.Name: cameraX
Parameter.DisplayName: X coordinate of the object on image from camera

Parameter.Name: cameraY
Parameter.DisplayName: Y coordinate of the object on image from camera

Parameter.Name: forwardShift
Parameter.DisplayName: Distance from the robot to the object on parallel axis

Parameter.Name: sideShift
Parameter.DisplayName: Distance from the robot to the object on perpendicular axis

Parameter.Name: leftDownX
Parameter.DisplayName: X coordinate of the lower left corner

Parameter.Name: leftDownY
Parameter.DisplayName: Y coordinate of the lower left corner

Parameter.Name: rightUpX
Parameter.DisplayName: X coordinate of the upper right corner

Parameter.Name: rightUpY
Parameter.DisplayName: Y coordinate of the upper right corner

Parameter.Name: isInRect
Parameter.DisplayName: Is the object inside the rectangle
